Name: Weggye's Adventures
About the game: Weggye's Adventures throws you into the magical world of the little plant named Weggye. But an evil tree wants to turn the whole world into a wasteland. To do this, he hunts all empowering creatures. Sunny was locked in a cage. The Baninos hide in fear. And to protect itself, the tree has its energy captured in crystals. Can you help Weggye to save the world. Features: ● Find keys in chests to free Sunny. ● Explore the landscape to find the hiding Baninos. ● Collect crystals ● Collect gold nuggets to get life. ● Fight a variety of monsters using different skills. ● But be careful! Evil does not sleep.
